World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 1 月 7 日，星期日 08:43:42 GMT 120
Blinken presses Arab states to discuss the future of GazaU.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken was set to push Israel’s Arab neighbors on Sunday to play a future role in running Gaza, even as he aims to quell tensions beyond Israel’s offensive against Palestinian Hamas militants in the strip. Sun, 07 Jan 2024 08:36:56 GMT 6CO3BNW6PFMZ7PTTG4JONJNXYU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/blinken-presses-arab-states-discuss-future-gaza-2024-01-07/Simon Lewis, Suleiman Al-Khalidi世界中东
North Korea firing shots again near border with South - YonhapNorth Korea on Sunday was firing shots into the sea north of South Korea's Yeonpyeong island, Yonhap news agency reported, citing the South's military. Sun, 07 Jan 2024 08:17:42 GMT AILAZAPM75KYJDGAILAGZ2FKRE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-korea-firing-shots-again-near-border-with-south-yonhap-2024-01-07/Reuters世界亚太地区
Russia launches 28 drones, three missiles at Ukraine - Ukraine's air forceRussia launched 28 attack drones and three cruise missile at Ukraine overnight, Ukraine's air force said on Sunday, adding that its air defence systems destroyed 21 of the drones. Sun, 07 Jan 2024 08:02:48 GMT GVQYZUPIWFI65BT6CQSAZKQR7U https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-launches-28-drones- Three-missiles-ukraine-ukraines-air-force-2024-01-07/Reuters世界欧洲
North Korea's Kim Yo Jong vows immediate response to provocation -KCNANorth Korea's army will immediately launch a "baptism of fire" in response to any provocation, Kim Yo Jong, the powerful sister of leader Kim Jong Un, said on Sunday, in comments carried by state news agency KCNA. Sun, 07 Jan 2024 07:43:38 GMT CFCMTEOPEJJUBDG3DCB2DSMYPU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-koreas-kim-yo-jong-vows-immediate-response-pro Vocation-kcna-2024-01-07/Reuters世界亚太地区
Japan premier vows "ceaseless" aid as snow hampers quake reliefJapan's prime minister vowed to provide "ceaseless" support to areas devastated by the New Year's Day earthquake as snow and sleet hampered rescue and relief efforts and local media reported that the disaster had now claimed at least 126 lives. Sun, 07 Jan 2024 06:33:49 GMT BAPZMNHEM5IAPKYEWXCH257UI4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/japan-premier-vows-ceaseless-aid-snow-hampers-quake-relief-2024-01-07/Kevin Buckland, Kiyoshi Takenaka世界亚太地区
Six Palestinians, 1 Israeli killed in West Bank clashes - officialsAn Israeli air strike killed six Palestinians in the occupied West Bank, the Palestinian health ministry said on Sunday, as Israel said one its soldiers had been killed, during a visit to the region by U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken. Sun, 07 Jan 2024 06:15:09 GMT MV5MFSCRJRJVHIYJIEC6E6M6JI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-air-strike-kills-6-palestinians-west-banks-jenin-health-ministry-2024-01-07/Reuters世界中东
NTSB says no passengers seated near Boeing 737 MAX 9 fuselage that failedThe head of the U.S. National Transportation Safety Board said no passengers were seated next to a cabin panel that blew out on an Alaska Airlines Boeing 737 MAX 9, forcing an emergency landing Friday in a potentially "tragic" incident. Sun, 07 Jan 2024 05:35:51 GMT MW6Z4R5U4FKJXIRFVKKMRZGVRQ https://www.reuters.com/world/us/ntsb-says-no-passengers-seated-near-boeing-737-max-9-fuselage-that-failed-2024-01-07/David Shepardson, Valerie Insinna, Tim Hepher世界美国
Japan prosecutors make first arrest in political funding scandalA lawmaker from Japan's ruling party was arrested on Sunday for suspected fundraising violations, the first arrest in a scandal that has battered support for Prime Minister Fumio Kishida. Sun, 07 Jan 2024 04:47:02 GMT ZRWZBV7PN5MZJDSVYZL6KEK3C4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/japan-prosecutors-make-first-arrest-political-funding-scandal-media-2024-01-07/Kevin Buckland世界亚太地区
On Orthodox Christmas Putin vows to back soldiers who 'defend' RussiaPresident Vladimir Putin vowed on the eve of Orthodox Christmas to back soldiers who "with arms in hands" defend Russia's interests, ordering his government greater support of those who fight and calling on his people to be merciful and just. Sun, 07 Jan 2024 00:26:09 GMT CICEKLFGXFI33AETA3NIJMFZQ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/orthodox-christmas-putin-vows-back-soldiers-who-defend-Russia-2024-01-07/Reuters世界欧洲
Three months in, Western diplomats try to stop Gaza war's spreadTop U.S and European diplomats sought ways on Sunday to keep the Gaza war from spreading further in the Middle East, but three months after the start of the conflict, more bloodshed underlined the difficulties they face. Sun, 07 Jan 2024 00:09:37 GMT VEYAY6KWVNIENJ52AK54YKVTHU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/third-months-deaths-mount-diplomats-vie-stop-gaza-wars-spread-2024-01-07/Ari Rabinovitch, Simon Lewis世界中东
Bangladesh PM Hasina votes in general election boycotted by opponentsBangladesh Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina cast her vote on Sunday soon after polls opened in a general election boycotted by the main opposition party and which is set to give the ruling Awami League-led alliance a fourth straight term in power. Sat, 06 Jan 2024 18:06:07 GMT SS4WTYSAB5JZHDVXN3VMVDHJ7E https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/pm-hasina-set-extend-tenure-main-bangladesh-opposition-boycotts-election-2024-01-06/Sudipto Ganguly, Ruma Paul世界亚太地区
